product_name: Kiss My Face Hot Spots Sport Sunscreen - SPF 30
long_description: Kiss My Face Hot Spots SPF 30 sunscreen is perfect for delicate areas, such as your ears, lips, nose, cheeks and brow. Made with natural and organic ingredients, including beeswax, coconut oil, aloe and wild-crafted shea butter. Biodegradable sunscreen is unscented, paraben free and phthalate free; contains no artificial fragrances. Not tested on animals. Kiss My Face Hot Spots SPF 30 sunscreen is water resistant.
short_description: Kiss My Face Hot Spots SPF 30 sunscreen is perfect for delicate areas, such as your ears, lips, nose, cheeks and brow.
